title: For Sale:  N172 Old Judge Count Mullane  SGC 80
author: Archive

posts.post_title: For Sale:  N172 Old Judge Count Mullane  SGC 80
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Wesley
Great N172 Old Judge card of Tony Mullane, who is one the great stars of the era still not yet inducted into the Hall of Fame.  If selected by the veterans committee in the future, look for the price of this card to increase dramatically.

SGC 80 EX-MT  N172 Tony Mullane

(This is the highest grade by SGC)

MOVED TO EBAY

[url]http://cgi.ebay.com/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewItem&item=8828344744[/url]
